title: What is Naturopathic Medicine? Primary Care Santa Rosa CA
author: Premier Integrative Medicine
description: Naturopathic medicine combines modern science and the power of traditional, natural forms of medicine to treat the whole person. It focuses on treating the cause of an illness, rather than the symptoms to provide long-term health.
cleaned_text: What is Naturopathic Medicine? What is Naturopathic Medicine? Naturopathic medicine combines modern science and the power of traditional, natural forms of medicine to treat the whole person.
